<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the global namespace attached to mission.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''missionNamespace'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Namespace]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[missionNamespace]] [[setVariable]] ["YourString",3];//Same as: YourString = 3;
_yourString = [[missionNamespace]] [[getVariable]] "YourString";</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[currentNamespace]], [[uiNamespace]], [[parsingNamespace]], [[profileNamespace]], [[localNamespace]], [[allVariables]], [[with]], [[ArmA:_Editing#Forward_Compatibility|Forward Compatibility]]
</value></part></template>
